thread.title: Peep this: New Hampshire launches new foliage tracker for leaf peepers
thread.title_full: Peep this: New Hampshire launches new foliage tracker for leaf peepers - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Peep this: New Hampshire launches new foliage tracker for leaf peepers
text:
CONCORD, N.H. - Attention, leaf peepers: New Hampshire has started a new foliage tracker aimed at helping visitors plan their 'peak' fall adventure.
The interactive, mobile-friendly tracker offers regional reports of New Hampshire's scenery, lodging and dining suggestions, points of interest around the state, and leaf peeper images.
Travel officials say about 8.5 million people are expected to visit New Hampshire this fall, an increase of about 5 per cent from last year. Spending from these visitors is anticipated to be up 7 per cent, reaching $1.3 billion.
The fall season is historically the second busiest season in the state, attracting more than 25 per cent of all visitors to New Hampshire annually.
